lab1

类 StuList

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab1.StuList

  • public class StuList
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      StuList()
      Init the StuList using the default capacity 定义为static是为了让所以对象的DEFAULT_CAPACITY都一样为15，而定义为final是防止值被改变
      StuList(int cap)
      Init the StuList using the given cap

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean addStu(Student x)
      add a number to stus
      boolean isEmpty()
      judge the stus is empty or not
      void print()
      print the information of all the students
      Student removeStu_id(int stuId)
      Delete a student by its Id
      Student removeStu(int index)
      Delete a student at a designated spot.
      void sort()
      sort the stus by students' averscore

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • StuList

        public StuList()
        Init the StuList using the default capacity 定义为static是为了让所以对象的DEFAULT_CAPACITY都一样为15，而定义为final是防止值被改变

      • StuList

        public StuList(int cap)
        Init the StuList using the given cap
        参数:
        cap - the length of stus

    • 方法详细资料

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        judge the stus is empty or not
        返回:
        if is empty,return true.else return flase

      • addStu

        public boolean addStu(Student x)
        add a number to stus
        参数:
        x - the number added to stus
        返回:
        if is overflow return true,else return false

      • removeStu

        public Student removeStu(int index)
        Delete a student at a designated spot.
        参数:
        index - the position you want to delete
        返回:
        the student you delete

      • removeStu_id

        public Student removeStu_id(int stuId)
        Delete a student by its Id
        参数:
        stuId - the Id of the students you delete
        返回:
        the student you delete

      • sort

        public void sort()
        sort the stus by students' averscore

      • print

        public void print()
        print the information of all the students
